title: HOW TO STAND WITH HONG KONG？ SAY NO TO CHINA！

replies.msg:
外國人點幫手？

Say no to Evil Empire of China
stop buying from PRC, no Huawei Xiaomi Oppo Wechat Alibaba
Stop Investing PRC, sell out PRC stock and bonds, no pension fund invest in China
Stop visiting PRC, you may be taken hostage by PRC authority for no reason

support HK, Taiwan, Tibet, Uighur
We need to have a list of brands/companies as target first. That would be easier to call for action.

Stand with Hong Kong Boycott China

1. Boycott made in China

2. Boycott China Brand:

4G/5G Service: Huawei, ZTE
Cell Phone: Huawei, Xiaomi
TV, Refrigerators, Air products: Hisense
Consumer electronics and home appliances: Haier
Railway Service in UK, Sweden, Norway, AU: MTR
PC: Lenovo
Drone: DJI
Beer: TSINGTAO
Game: Riot LOL, Blizzard
Mobile videos: Tik Tok
Delivery Services: SF Express

seek help from local politican.

Vite for those who standwithfreedom.
What can foreigners do to support HK? https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=2483489171872554&id=2406628919558580

It's useless. It's difficult to boycott Chinese things which are very cheap. If you don't want people buying Chinese things. You need to think more and make the things which are cheaper and better in quality than them. Market should be determined by free market but not what you said because human is greedy.

quote.msg: It's useless. It's difficult to boycott Chinese things which are very cheap. If you don't want people buying Chinese things. You need to think more and make the things which are cheaper and better in quality than them. Market should be determined by free market but not what you said because human is greedy.

replies.msg:
Yes, you don't have to boycott every produce made in China, can you boycott iphone from Apple, which is product of China?

However, you have a choice for not buying big China brand, such as smartphones from Huawei, Xiaomi, which are alleged of stealing western technologies, copycat of designs and planting backdoor to spy on users.
